name: Pos_splitTest
description: Unit tests for the Pos.split method, which splits a string based on a delimiter and validates the input.

test_cases.name: testSplit_ValidInput
test_cases.description: Tests the Pos.split method with valid input, ensuring it correctly splits the string and returns the expected result.

test_cases.name: testSplit_InvalidInput
test_cases.description: Tests the Pos.split method with invalid input, ensuring it throws an IllegalArgumentException with the expected message.
